oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Margo Price - 2016-09-21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by and interview with Margo Price from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum o September 21, 2016. Presented in partnership with the Americana Music Association.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Margo Price;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Interview conducted by Ann Powers. Includes comments from Jed Hilley. Performances with band include; Hands Of Time -- About To Find Out -- I Lost It (with Lilly Hyatt) -- Weekender -- Since You Put Me Down -- Clean Slate (Lilly Hyatt with Erin Rae and Margo Price) -- Hard Life (Aaron Lee Tasjan) -- Life Is Hard (Darrin Bradbury) -- Hurtin' On the Bottle (Margo Price with Kenny Vaughan on guitar) -- Matt Ross-Spang talks about recording at Sun Studio in Memphis -- Four Years Of Chances.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Price, Margo, 1983-; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
